Message.Title: Texas says "oops" on defunding planned parenthood?
Message.Msg: "About a year after Texas slashed its family-planning budget by two-thirds...... The state's health commission says Texas will see nearly 24,000 unplanned births between 2014 and 2015 thanks to these cuts, raising state and federal taxpayer's Medicaid costs by up to $273 million"

Message.Title: another scam pump and dump at its best
Message.Msg: hedge fund runs up share price to make people think its great stock. sell short then dump shares at lower price to fool people into thinking great value all the while selling short back to 8. watch for the major drops as people wise up! where is the sec? IMHO

Topic.Title: CEMENT FLOOR at $10 Do not sell etfc.

Message.Msg: Citi was shed of their shares before Fridays open, it'd be hard to imagine them having any more dump power when they'd have to buy the stock to do it. Their actions would have been more effective at keeping the price down if they'd waiting until AFTER earnings to do it. At least this way we have an upcoming even which may either lend us a boost, or hammer us into the sand. Plan wisely.
They are cheating ordinary people out of their moneys !!!!

Message.Msg: Change from take it from them and give it to us, to I've got mine you go get yours.

Who knows though, shady stuff happens all the time.
